Class AbiquoContextImpl

java.lang.Object
  com.google.common.collect.ForwardingObject

              org.jclouds.abiquo.internal.AbiquoContextImpl
All Implemented Interfaces:
Closeable, AbiquoContext, org.jclouds.compute.ComputeServiceContext, org.jclouds.View
@Singleton
public class AbiquoContextImpl
extends org.jclouds.compute.internal.ComputeServiceContextImpl
implements AbiquoContext

Abiquo RestContextImpl implementation to expose high level Abiquo functionalities.

Author:
Ignasi Barrera
